items.summary: Update the /admin experience so it no longer requires Internet Identity login and no longer prompts for a name/profile; instead, show a password-only login form and grant access when the password equals exactly "harsh600606".

Add a backend API that allows fetching the stored contact/quote submissions using the shared password "harsh600606" so that the admin dashboard can load submissions without Internet Identity admin permissions.

Update the admin dashboard UI to fetch and display the quote replies (contact/quote submissions: name, phone, email, message, date) after successful password login, and remove the current 'Access Denied / Only authorized administrators' blocking state for password-authenticated users.

Persist the successful admin password session on the client so that refreshing the page or navigating away/back to #/admin during the same browser session does not require re-entering the password; provide a clear 'Log out' action that clears the session and returns the user to the password prompt.
